content.html: If you're on a jury in an illegal abortion case, you can just not convict. Don't tell the prosecutor you're gonna do that. Don't say anything to get yourself disqualified during voir dire. Just put on your best normie-mode act, sit through the trial, and don't convict. EZPZ.
content.value:
If you're on a jury in an illegal abortion case, you can just not convict.

Don't tell the prosecutor you're gonna do that.  Don't say anything to get yourself disqualified during voir dire.  Just put on your best normie-mode act, sit through the trial, and don't convict.  EZPZ.
